By Scorpio Maurus on Tuesday, August 8, 2006 - 07:08 am:

I know I read somewhere on here someone who wanted to know if there were enemy monster Cards or Brimides. Though now I don't see the post & I know I posted a reply that I'd look into it using my Action Replay. Obviously I don't have any enemy monsters in the Book which is sad I liked that feature in MR2. There are sadly no enemy cards in the Bromides I have either. I have 53 which I assume is all because I haven't found any others but I could be wrong. Bromides # 1-25 are Monsters Bromides# 26-33 are your characters and Bromides# 34-53 are all gadgets. I hope I am proven wrong by the game someday and that you can possibly get Bromides with Enemy Monsters.
